author: SenneVanPutte
body:
#### PR description:

Moved the submission system of the tracker alignment HIPAlignmentAlgorithm to the HTCondor framework using the DAGman functionality. This was needed as the batch submissions will no longer be supported.

#### PR validation:

Submission does not change to the user side of view. The code has been tested against different cases of DAGman failures (unexpected failures of the DAGman submission, unexpected stops of the DAGman job, known failures resulting in rescue files).
title: TkAlignment HipPy condor submission
